name: @waves/event-sender
description: An interface for sending analytics events from Waves JS applications

scripts.browserify: browserify -u @waves/waves-browser-bus dist/analytics-iframe.js -o dist/analytics-iframe.js && browserify -u @waves/waves-browser-bus dist/Analytics.js -s analytics -o dist/analytics.js
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy && npm run browserify && npm run remove-compiled
